DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect external diaphragmatic pacemaker patient chronic cor pulmonale . Half participant receive external diaphragmatic pacemaker , half receive routine therapy .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect External Diaphragmatic Pacemaker Patients With Chronic Cor Pulmonale
DOC.detailed_description: Investigate effect external diaphragmatic pacemaker chronic cor pulmonale , indicator include : respiratory muscle force , diaphragmatic degree excursion thickness , pulmonary artery pressure , respiratory distress , feel fatigue quality life , pulmonary function , NT-proBNP , PaO2 PaCO2 .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis chronic cor pulmonale admit hospital pneumothorax mediastinal emphysema active tuberculosis install cardiac pacemaker acute cardiocerebrovascular event : acute myocardial infarction , acute myocarditis , severe arrhythmia , severe cerebrovascular accident . pregnancy endstage patient ( expect survival time le 6 month )
